title: verify inline policy by selecting single access method
custom_summary: verify inline policy by selecting single access method
custom_preconds:
1. tenant webui should accessible
2. client should be up and running.
custom_steps:
steps:
1. login to tenant webui
2. go to policies -> Inline -> New policy
3. click add criteria -> access method
4. select one access method(client)
5. click public app access or DLP tab from dropdown menu
6. select any app
7. select block action
custom_expected:
We should be able to select one access methods and ,
the accessed method based policies should work as expected.
